org.magnos.task
Interface TaskListener<R>

Type Parameters:
R - The result type.
All Known Implementing Classes:
Task, TaskCollection, TaskFork, TaskGroup, TaskList, TaskListenerAdapter, TaskSet
public interface TaskListener<R>

A listener notified on the events of task.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Method Summary
 void onTaskCancel(Task<R> source)
          The method invoked when a task is cancelled before it begins running.
 void onTaskError(Task<R> source, java.lang.Throwable error)
          The method invoked when a task executes and throws an error.
 void onTaskFinish(Task<R> source)
          The method invoked when a task is completely finished.
 void onTaskSuccess(Task<R> source, R result)
          The method invoked when a task completes successfully (was not canceled, timed out, and did not produce an error).
 void onTaskTimeout(Task<R> source)
          The method invoked when a task times out.
 

Method Detail

onTaskFinish

void onTaskFinish(Task<R> source)
The method invoked when a task is completely finished. The task either succeeded, errored, was canceled, or timed out.

Parameters:
source - The task that finished.

onTaskSuccess

void onTaskSuccess(Task<R> source,
                   R result)
The method invoked when a task completes successfully (was not canceled, timed out, and did not produce an error).

Parameters:
source - The task that finished successfully.
result - The result of the task.

onTaskError

void onTaskError(Task<R> source,
                 java.lang.Throwable error)
The method invoked when a task executes and throws an error.

Parameters:
source - The task that finished after throwing an exception.
error - The exception thrown.

onTaskCancel

void onTaskCancel(Task<R> source)
The method invoked when a task is cancelled before it begins running.

Parameters:
source - The task that was cancelled.

onTaskTimeout

void onTaskTimeout(Task<R> source)
The method invoked when a task times out. A task can time out while its running or while its waiting.

Parameters:
source - The task that timed out.
